name: n3vrHUD
body:
###Welcome to n3vrHUD's offical website                      > [Download](https://github.com/n3vrtf2/n3vrhudtf2)                      > [Screenshots](http://imgur.com/a/ybOdg)

![](http://i.imgur.com/WjOGFWE.jpg)

## Informations
This hud requires you to have "cl_hud_minmode 0" to make it work.

This hud is a modification of rayshud and other nice huds.

### Credits
Rays - Rayshud

Flame - Flamehud

flatline - flathud

and other people.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
